Title: WPF: MVVM & Unity
Description:
MVVM and Unity sample hows how to implement MVVM pattern using Unity container.
Source code: C#
Required: Unity Application Block 1.2 (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd203101.aspx) 
or Unity 2.0 (http://unity.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx)
